@@ -1,867 +0,0 @@
-class Camisa:%0A    def __init__(self):%0A        self.__tamanho = %22%22%0A%0A    def getTamanho(self) -%3E str:%0A        return self.__tamanho%0A%0A    def setTamanho(self, tamain: str):%0A        t_val = %5B%22PP%22, %22P%22, %22M%22, %22G%22, %22XG%22%5D%0A        if tamain not in t_val:%0A            print(%22tamanho invalido, tente PP, P, M, G ou XG%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.__tamanho = tamain%0A%0A    def show(self) -%3E None:%0A        print(self)%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return (f%22size: (%7Bself.getTamanho()%7D)%22)%0A%0Adef main():%0A    camisa = Camisa()%0A%0A    while True:%0A        line = input()%0A        print(%22$%22 + line)%0A        caixinhas = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A        if caixinhas%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A        elif caixinhas%5B0%5D == %22criar%22:%0A            tamain = caixinhas%5B1%5D%0A            camisa.setTamanho(tamain)%0A        elif caixinhas%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(camisa)%0A        %0A%0A%0A    %0A%0A%0Amain()
